command: docker run --rm -v config:/config debian bash -lc 'find /config -type f -name "*.pem" -print0 | xargs -0 -r shred -n 3 -z -u; sync'
explanation: Targets sensitive certificate material in the 'config' volume by name, using three-pass overwrite and deletion, followed by a sync.
rationale_steps: Select only *.pem files to avoid unnecessary destruction
Use shred with multiple passes and zero-fill, then unlink
